name: On a Roll (itch) (Gangrue)
description:
Play as a relentless roll of die.

A nasty forest inhabited by flies is ruining your night of poker.

Roll and squash bugs while shooting down any that try and flee.

The only catch is... Each move only goes as far as you roll the dice!

Controls:

Click to move.

Click to shoot.

Click to win.

Rolling over an enemy is an attack. So is shooting.

Rolling over an enemy reloads your gun! Important!

F4 for fullscreen.

ESC to exit.

Upgrades:

"Leveling up" gives you 1 of 3 random choices for an upgrade. All of these are stackable. The following are the current choices:

HP+. Looks like a spade+. This gives one more health.

MAG+. This gives one extra bullet in the magazine.

SPD+. 8 Speed is added to the player. If you're into rolling on enemies.

Double Shot. Doubles the bullets per shot.

Fanfire. You create a circle of small bullets around you.

Vampirism. Rolling over enemies gives you back 1 HP.

I hope you enjoy it! I had a blast making this. Now I need some sleep lol.

I made all the sprites and code during the jam, but music was used by: @xDeviruchi
